switch.question: Can I switch plans later?
switch.answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your dashboard. Changes take effect immediately.

contract.question: Is there a long-term contract?
contract.answer: No contracts. You can cancel your subscription at any time. If you cancel, your plan will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. All payments are securely processed.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.
